name: DRIFT (itch) (Spectral Studios)
description:
You are an explorer and you are about to be swallowed by a firestorm, you only have one minute to return to your ship and escape the planet.

It's a game I made for the One Minute Jam hosted by farsidevirtual, Unfortunately, I couldn't upload the game on time xD

the character and the other assets are from sketchfabsounds are from freesound

Controls:

1 - WASD to run
